Of course, I'd be happy to recommend a mockumentary movie based on your preferences! "Armageddon" (1998) is an hilarious and entertaining film that follows the story of 10 men who could potentially lead the world, including Dr. Ken, a leading Hong Kong scientist. The movie features an all-star cast, including Eddie Griffin, Erik Per Sullivan, Jason Isaacs, Owen Wilson, Will Patton, and Bruce Willis. I think you'll find it to be a thoroughly enjoyable watch! 😊

Alternatively, if you're interested in a more psychological and mysterious take on the mockumentary genre, then "White Night" (2007) might be more up your alley. The film follows an inspector as he re-investigates a long-forgotten murder case that he couldn't solve years ago, and it uncovers some surprising and dark secrets along the way. The movie features a talented cast, including 3 actors who have worked together before in "The Secret of My Success" (N/A). Let me know if you're interested in either of these movies, and I'd be happy to provide more information! 😊
